name: github_issues
description: Manage GitHub issues and files - list/create/update issues, create/update/delete files in a repository. Use create_file to write reports or documentation. Requires GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable.

action.description: The action to perform: list (list issues), create (new issue), get (single issue), update (modify issue), comment (add comment), get_file (read file), create_file (create new file), update_file (update existing file), delete_file (delete file)

owner.description: Repository owner (username or organization). Default: strugcity

state.description: Filter issues by state (for list action). Default: open

issue_number.description: Issue number (required for get, update, comment actions)

labels.description: Labels to apply to the issue

path.description: File path in the repository (e.g., 'docs/architecture/PROJECT_ATLAS.md'). Required for file actions.

content.description: File content to write (required for create_file and update_file actions)

message.description: Commit message for file operations. Default: 'Create/Update/Delete {path}'

branch.description: Branch name for file operations. Default: repository's default branch

sha.description: File SHA (auto-fetched if not provided for update_file and delete_file)
